title: Why Choose WSXJS?
description: Built for modern web development with a focus on simplicity, performance, and developer experience.

approachable.title: Approachable
approachable.description: Builds on top of standard Web Components with intuitive JSX syntax and world-class TypeScript support. Easy to learn and use.

performant.title: Performant
performant.description: Zero dependencies, native DOM operations, and compiler-optimized rendering system that rarely requires manual optimization.

versatile.title: Versatile
versatile.description: A rich, incrementally adoptable ecosystem that scales from simple components to full-featured applications.
